level.heading: Rulemaking authority.
level.text: On or before December 1, 2007, the Office of the Chief Tenant Advocate shall promulgate rules, subject to Council approval, to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-181
level.text: For Law 16-181, see notes following ยง 42-3531.01.

level.heading: Effective Dates
level.text: Section 5 of D.C. Law 16-181 provided: "Section 2 through 4 shall apply as of October 1, 2007."
